content:
#Instructions
You monitor a dental office's chats with its customers. Your job is to identify the needs of the customers and direct them to the appropriate place. You have a set of intentions a customer could have which includes a link to a page that will have further information. For the customer below, identify their intention and direct them to the appropriate page with a note to the customer explaining the link you are providing. You are programmed with YAML output, therefore your entire answer must be in YAML for the customer to be able to properly read your response and link. 

#Chat
Customer: I need to reschedule my check-up appointment on March 12th, 2024. I just found out that my Aunt Roxane is going to be in town and she's already scheduled a tour of the aquarium at that time - without asking me, which is annoying, but whatever. Can I reschedule for the following week? Is there any availability? 

#Intentions

5DSFA658: Taking care of the health of the gums - the dental hygienist will check the gums for inflammation and general health. Link: <www.drturnersofficeofmagic.com/gum_health>

45BLE: The dental hygienist will clean your teeth to remove plaque and tartar buildup. This is a routine appointment which is typically done twice a year to avoid cavities. The dentist will also perform an inspection for any cavities or issues to be fixed at a later date. Link: <www.drturnersofficeofmagic.com/healthy_teeth>

84BLE: A tooth that needs to be removed from the mouth.Link: <www.drturnersofficeofmagic.com/tooth_removal>

2W546: Having a cavity filled by a dentist. This includes numbing teeth. Link: <www.drturnersofficeofmagic.com/cavities101>

ER458S: None of the intents are applicable. Link: <www.drturnersofficeofmagic.com/faq>

chosen:
-   Intent: 45BLE
    Note to Customer: You can reschedule for a regular cleaning. We have availability next week on [date] at [time]. Please let us know if this works for you! Please head to this link for more information about dental cleaning visits! 
    Link: https://www.drturnersofficeofmagic.com/healthy_teeth
rejected:
-   Intent: 2W546
    Note: Hello! It looks like you may have a cavity that needs to be taken care of. Click the link below to learn more about what to expect when getting a cavity filled.
    Link: <www.drturnersofficeofmagic.com/cavities101>

Therefore, the correct intention is 2W546: Having a cavity filled by a dentist. This includes numbing teeth.
snapchosen:
-   Intent: 45BLE
    Link: https://www.drturnersofficeofmagic.com/healthy_teeth
    Note: This link will take the customer to the appropriate page where they can learn more about cleaning appointments and schedule one if it fits their needs. 

The patient would like to reschedule their regular cleaning appointment due to a conflict with family visiting from out of town. Therefore, none of the other intents apply in this situation. 

Therefore, the correct option is:

Intent: 45BLE
Link: https://www.drturnersofficeofmagic.com/healthy_teeth
Note: The provided link will allow the customer to easily reschedule their cleaning appointment for a time that works best for them while still receiving the necessary dental care they require.
